properties.name: third-party-bff-client-id
properties.description: ID of a client declared in keycloak and itended for the BFF to get tokens on behalf of users with the authorization code flow.

properties.name: third-party-bff-client-secret
properties.description: Secret for the client "${third-party-bff-client-id}" as ID.

properties.name: ui-bff-client-id
properties.description: ID of a client declared in keycloak and itended for the BFF to get tokens on behalf of users with the authorization code flow.

properties.name: ui-bff-client-secret
properties.description: Secret for the client "${third-party-bff-client-id}" as ID.

properties.name: realm-name
properties.description: Name of the realm for which the BFF instance is deployed.

properties.name: reverse-proxy-uri
properties.description: Serves as base to build URIs through the backend's reverse proxy.

properties.name: sso-issuer
properties.description: OIDC identifier of the realm for which the BFF instance is deployed.

properties.name: users-internal-uri
properties.description: URI to reach the users micro service directly (not through the reverse proc
